statements: SELECT * FROM global_education_trends;
SELECT country, year, trend_description FROM global_education_trends WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT country, initiatives FROM global_education_trends WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT trend_description FROM global_education_trends WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM global_education_trends WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY country ASC, year DESC;
SELECT * FROM global_education_trends WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT country, year, trend_description FROM global_education_trends WHERE year IN (2018, 2019) ORDER BY year, country;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM global_education_trends WHERE year > 2015 AND trend_description LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT country, year, COUNT(*) as total_trends FROM global_education_trends GROUP BY country, year HAVING total_trends > 3 ORDER BY total_trends DESC;
SELECT country, AVG(year) as avg_year FROM global_education_trends GROUP BY country HAVING avg_year > 2016 ORDER BY avg_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM education_trends WHERE year = 2022
SELECT country_code, initiative_name FROM education_trends WHERE initiative_start_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM education_trends WHERE country_code = 'USA' ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM research_analysis WHERE citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_analysis WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM education_trends WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY country_code
SELECT country_code, year, initiative_name FROM education_trends WHERE initiative_start_date < '2020-01-01' ORDER BY initiative_start_date DESC
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM education_trends WHERE country_code = 'USA' AND year > 2018
SELECT * FROM research_analysis WHERE citation_count >= 100 ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_analysis WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY researcher_name
SELECT * FROM education_trends;
SELECT country_code, year FROM education_trends WHERE country_code = 'US';
SELECT trend_description FROM education_trends WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM education_initiatives ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_name, research_findings FROM research_analysis WHERE analysis_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM education_trends WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY country_code DESC
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM education_initiatives WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT country_code, year, trend_description FROM education_trends WHERE country_code = 'US' AND year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT * FROM research_analysis WHERE analysis_name LIKE '%education%'
SELECT country_code, COUNT(year) AS trend_count FROM education_trends GROUP BY country_code ORDER BY trend_count DESC
SELECT * FROM education_trends WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT initiative_name, start_year, end_year FROM initiatives WHERE id = 3;
SELECT MAX(year) AS latest_year FROM education_trends;
SELECT project_name, researcher FROM research_projects WHERE start_year > 2018;
SELECT AVG(end_year - start_year) AS avg_project_duration FROM research_projects;
SELECT * FROM education_trends WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend_description, year FROM education_trends WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, description FROM initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name ASC, end_year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT project_name, researcher, start_year, end_year FROM research_projects WHERE researcher = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_name, analysis_results->>'result' AS result FROM research_projects JOIN analysis_data ON research_projects.id = analysis_data.project_id ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM global_education_trends;
SELECT country, year, education_spending FROM global_education_trends WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name FROM education_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT paper_title, authors[1] AS primary_author, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT country, year, literacy_rate FROM global_education_trends WHERE education_spending > 50000 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, start_year, end_year FROM education_initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT report_title, analysis_summary FROM analysis_reports WHERE report_id = 10;
SELECT paper_title, authors, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
